about_the_game:
Note: This product is included in the Season Pass 1. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

"Happy Wedding Costume Vol.2 Set" for the characters of DOA6.
A set of 13 costumes for 13 characters.

This costume set features costumes for Tina, Helena, Ayane, La Mariposa, Christie, Mila, Honoka, Phase 4, Zack, Eliot, Brad Wong, Rig, and Diego.

Note:
- You must have the latest update installed before using this content.
- The full version of this game that is sold separately is required to use this product. Please make sure you also install the latest patch if it is required.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, Partial Nudity, Sexual Content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 （64bit）
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 or over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 or over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 （64bit）
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 8700 or over
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 or over
